messages.content: Dear Friend, We are now only days away from the General Election. Very soon people will be deciding who will stand up for the residents of Eastbourne as their next MP.

issues.governance: Our country is in desperate need for real change. Gordon Brown has let us all down and failed to deliver on the key issues facing our country.

housing.content: The current MP has angered many residents by using taxpayers money to claim on a large family home over sixty miles outside the constituency.

leaflet.personalStatement: After 19 years of disappointment from the MP, it's time for change - I believe I can win and deliver that change for Eastbourne and Willingdon.

politicalExperience.achievements: I live right at the heart of our community in Old Town. As someone who uses the same services that you do, I fully understand the issues facing us all.

images.caption: Stephen Lloyd with various community members and environments.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please display the provided poster with this letter. Displaying the poster will show the support for our campaign for real change and prove that we can win. If you have also included a smaller poster which could go by the door or in your garden, that'd be really great.
